document.full_text: russian space officials hope to resolve a communications problem on a soyuz tma-21 rocket in time for it to carry a russian-american crew to the international space station in early april.
document.title: russia seeking april date for delayed space launch
lines_and_colors: russian space officials hope to resolve a communications problem on a soyuz tma-21 rocket in time for it to carry a russian-american crew to the international space station in early april.
